CustomField.formula: CASE(Type__c, 'Labs/Bloodwork', 'LabResults.png', 'Cardiac Clearance', 'HeartEvaluation.png', 'Psychosocial Evaluation', 'Psyco.png', 'Palliative Evaluation', 'PallativeEvaluation.png', 'Financial Evaluation', 'Financial.png', 'Dental Clearance', 'DentalClearance.png', 'Cancer Screening', 'CancerScreening.png', 'Diagnostic Imaging', 'DiagnosticImage.png','' )
CustomField.label: Image Path
